message: Hello Bob, I believe this product will greatly benefit your business. I'm happy to offer it to you for $1,300,000.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $1,300,000 is way above my budget. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. This is a fair price considering the value to me.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is significantly higher than your offer.  I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000. This is a very competitive price for the benefits it offers.

Alice,  $1,150,000 is still too high. I'm willing to go up to $950,000. This is a significant increase from my last offer and reflects the value I see in your product. I hope we can reach an agreement.
